Title: The Hateful Eight
Overview: Bounty hunters seek shelter from a raging blizzard and get caught up in a plot of betrayal and deception.
Tagline: No one comes up here without a damn good reason.
Keywords: bounty hunter, wyoming, mountains, narration, hangman, stagecoach, blizzard, post civil war
production_companies: Double Feature Films, The Weinstein Company, FilmColony
Cast: Samuel L. Jackson, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Jason Leigh
